attributes.title: The app like doesn’t work at all
attributes.review: This app glitches all the time it send stuff without you knowing it is a really bad app and really needs to be fix or just taken down because no one uses it anyways.

attributes.title: I i could give it 0 stars I would
attributes.review: I opened the app and if asked my race. I said African American then it showed me a black screen that called me the n word and many other slurs. I later learned that it also took $250 out of my bank account. I will be suing.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: Just no. i downloaded this app to help Mr. Trump in the election, there for i will not be voting for him now. this app steals your money and credit card information. I have lost about 26.k in just 2 hours If you think about getting this app, i hope that you are ready to be bankrupt. NO TRUMP 2020.

attributes.title: The worst app
attributes.review: Downloaded the app to see what Republicans we’re raving about, but I only found a campaign for an overly ripe orange?? This isn’t real American politics is it? baby bunker boy cares more about statues than human lives lost to a virus and y’all are still gonna vote for him, who’s the real snowflake?

attributes.title: Blinded
attributes.review: I opened this app thinking I could find reasons to support trump, when all of a sudden, the app glitched and Trumps face came up on my screen. It was a piercing bright orange I could almost smell the fake chemicals of the tan, and it was so orange my eyes went blind and to this day I can’t see.

attributes.title: This app is Garbage 🗑
attributes.review: This app is so unacceptable it’s so rude and selfish and I’m mostly talking about our president trump he did so many rude things and bad things to america and this world he has created a lot of unacceptable things. I don’t like the app and you should not like it to.
